Title: Relates to release on medical parole for certain incarcerated individuals
Summary: Provides for the release on medical parole for incarcerated individuals who require the level of care typically provided in a nursing home setting or those who, because of their physical or cognitive condition, are limited in their ability to perform basic life activities.
LawCode: Add ยง259-u, amd ยง259-c, Exec L; amd ยง70.40, Pen L; amd ยง62, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the penal law and the social services law, in relation to release on medical parole for certain incarcerated individuals
